extendedInfo.description: Taking photographic art to the next level, Pretty Masculine brand presents an innovative digital photographic book for your Android. The PM Mike Ruiz app offers never before seen access to the entire creative process including behind the scenes footage, time lapse body art, interviews with models, and much more! As with the original endeavor, this latest project also highlights the juxtaposition of femininity with masculinity. However, we now look at the intent to deconstruct societal norms and expectations as to what not only what is defined as masculine, but what is defined as feminine as well. Enjoy exploring all the features below:â¢ A perfect quilt of amazing photography all from Mike Ruiz allows you to touch, explore, learn and interact with photos!â¢ Go behind the scenes with a special area dedicated to Mike Ruiz and his Pretty Masculine brand!â¢ See exclusive content only available in the app! â¢ See models morph before your eyes as you see them go from blank slate to full body makeup!â¢ Transform yourself and your friends with the interactive Studio Section where you can upload photos to give them a Pretty Masculine makeover!â¢ Get to know the Team of Models and Artists that make all this possible with their individual profiles that include bios, photos, videos and links to connect directly with them!â¢ Learn what warms the heart of the Pretty Masculine brand in the charity section where the PM Mike Ruiz app becomes a philanthropic conduit to various charitable organizations.So, as the audience and now as participant, let us touch and scroll our way through this pretty masculine (and feminine) labor of love and step into the mind of Mike Ruiz in a very organic and visceral wayâconquering it and making it our own.

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Nice to have Mike Ruiz\'s work wherever I go. I just hope I can still access it offline, have the Studio Section just like in iPad, and get updates as often as the iPad.
reviews.author: Edison Tan

reviews.title: BEST APP EVER!!!
reviews.comment: Pretty Masculine is a thing of sheer beauty. I love seeing art brought to life. And no other app has been able to do it quite like this. Mike Ruiz has forever changed how the world views masculinity, and made it look pretty fantastic.
reviews.author: Tristan Lee

reviews.title: The new portfolio!
reviews.comment: I am a photographer my self and found the app to be a masterpiece! Mike\'s work is incredible with it\'s own aesthetic which is why I downloaded the app. This has all his work at my disposal since I\'m not only a fan, but I use his photos as inspiration for my shoots. Essentially,  I have all his great work in my hands.  He\'s also updating it constantly with new work!
reviews.author: Carlos Maldonado R.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I\'m a photographer who has been a fan of Mike Ruiz\'s for years. His beautiful imagery is an addition to the Android platform that I\'ve been waiting for! I love this app
reviews.author: Chris Gosses

reviews.title: Videos choppy
reviews.comment: videos are choppy, pics take forever to load. However, i will give this app another try In a couple of months. I love the concept just technical issues.
reviews.author: Regulus Williams
